30,Navigate to Category Page and Verify,"Navigate to the home page, hover over an item, click the Apple link, and verify that the category page loads successfully.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

31,Complete Purchase of iPhone Case with Checkout Process,Navigate to the home page, select an iPhone case, add it to the cart, and complete the checkout process including entering user details and confirming the order.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object2
Step 3: Click on link Apple2 -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 4: Click on link iPhone15FineWovenCaseWithMagSafeTaupe -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/{*}'
Step 5: Click on label iPhone15Plus
Step 6: Click on button Buy
Step 7: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 8: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 9: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 10: Click on input Email
Step 11: Enter input value in input Email
Step 12: Click on div ContactInformation
Step 13: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 14: Click on link BackToTheCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 15: Click on button quantityAdjustment (IncreaseQuantity)
Step 16: Click on button quantityAdjustment (IncreaseQuantity)
Step 17: Click on button ProceedToCheckout
Step 18: Enter user details and proceed to payment section

column2: - Step 4: Enter input value in input FirstName

- Step 10: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 13: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 16: Enter input value in input City
- Step 19: Enter input value in input State
- Step 21: Enter input value in input Phone

column1: Step 19: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/{*}'
Step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

32,Add Product to Cart and Complete Checkout,Navigate to the home page, add a product to the cart, adjust the quantity, and complete the checkout process while entering user details for payment.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object2
Step 3: Click on link Apple2 -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 4: Click on button AddToCart
Step 5: Click on label productName (iPhone15Pro)
Step 6: Click on label productName (iPhone15ProMax)
Step 7: Click on button Buy
Step 8: Click on link GoToCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 9: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 10: Click on link BackToTheCart -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 11: Click on button quantityAdjustment (DecreaseQuantity)
Step 12: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 13: Click on div PaymentMethod
Step 14: Enter user details and proceed to payment section
